description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5fj27","text":"This protocol outlines the steps to produce large area, uniform supported lipid bilayers on SiO2 substrates with or without patterned features.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7v4rp","text":"Clean plain SiO2 or TiO2-patterned substrates by sonicating them in a 1:1 IPA:Acetone mixture for ~2 minutes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":15,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":23,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b89po","text":"Dry with a steady stream of N2","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":29,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fmd76","text":"Oxygen plasma clean the substrates for 2 minutes to remove any residual surface contamination","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"g0mc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a5kir","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":1,"offset":70,"style":"sub"}],"key":"66q8p","text":"For our Anatech SP-100 system, the RF power is set to 120 watts, the O2 flow rate to 15 ccm, and the pressure to 0.35-0.40 torr","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"18mno","text":"Prepare a 1.2 mg/mL DLPC 0.5mol% Rho-PE solution (suitable for FRAP measurements and general fluorescence imaging) or a 0.3mg/mL DLPC 0.0025mol% Rho-PE solution (suitable for FCS measurements)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bn6","text":"Extrude 1.2 (0.3) mg/mL DLPC 0.5 (0.0025) mol% Rho-PE solution 21 times","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dike9","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8f9r","text":"        ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":2,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":3,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9c2t6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4m4q9","text":" ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":0}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4fpqa","text":" ","type":"atomic"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5nfv3","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"length":1,"offset":0}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b3ic2","text":" ","type":"atomic"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4euij","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"length":1,"offset":0}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6bmar","text":" ","type":"atomic"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"aqe19","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"a5176","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2aerp","text":"To prepare the Mini Extruder, place filter supports in the middle of the rubber o-rings on the plastic cylinders. Deposit ~15 μL phosphate buffered saline on each support and use the pipette tip to move buffer around so each support is fully wet. Place the 100nm filter membrane on one of the supports, making sure it's secure with the phosphate buffered saline. Place the cylinder with the filter 3/4 of the way into the metal cylinder, place the other cylinder on top, sandwiching the membrane filter between the filter supports. Allow the cylinders to rest fully in the metal cylinder, then screw on the metal nut. Use one of the extruder syringes to measure out at least 300 μL of 1.2 (0.3) mg/mL DLPC 0.5 (0.0025) mol% Rho-PE solution and stick the syringe into one end of the just-assembled filter apparatus. Stick the other extruder syringe into the other end of the filter apparatus. Push the DLPC solution back and forth 21 times, ending in the syringe that was empty to begin with. Note that some solution will be lost during the extrusion process.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"brand":"Avanti Polar
